summary: Completed testing of Public Blog feature. Backend APIs (12/12 tests passed). Frontend blog pages working with minor issues. Mobile responsiveness verified on all pages.

ui_bugs.issue: Markdown content not rendered - raw markdown syntax (## headings, **bold**) displayed instead of formatted HTML

issues: react-helmet-async meta tags (description, og:*, twitter:*, canonical, JSON-LD schema) not being injected into DOM
Only page title is updating, other SEO meta tags show default values from index.html
This affects SEO and social sharing previews

action_items: Fix markdown rendering in BlogPost.js - consider using a markdown parser library (react-markdown, marked) to convert markdown to HTML

Fix react-helmet-async meta tag injection - the existing meta description in index.html may be preventing dynamic updates. Consider removing default meta tags from index.html or using data-react-helmet attribute

Blog post page: Title, author, date, read time, views, featured image, share buttons all visible
Social sharing: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Copy Link buttons present and functional
Mobile responsiveness: All pages (Home, Products, Blog, Contact) display correctly at 375px viewport
Header navigation: Blog link added in both desktop nav and mobile menu
View count: Increments correctly on each blog post view
